action.msg: You made the song about food?!
I did it to throw you off, and it worked!
I thought you did it cause you're hungry.
Okay, maybe that's half of the reason!
YOU KNOW WHAT??? IM DONE WITH YALL-
DUMB FRICKS-
The only dumb one here is you!
You knew what you were getting into, and you lost!
I'm so tired of the both of you NOT taking me SERIOUSLY!
Y'ALL LITERALLY NEED JESUS! LITERALLY!
IM SUMMONING GOD FOR THIS, AHAHA!
I think they've lost it.
Sorry- did they say they're summoning God?
This is the second time we've ran into some crazy religious nut.
Wait, what are you doi-
Hey, don't do anything stu-
Hello, my children.
Woah. Nice.
God's kinda good looking.
Wait, GOD?
Indeed. I have been freed from the host of that, annoying flirt.
And before I ascend back to the realm from whence I came.
You must prove yourself in battle, Fever. It's the only way for the both of you to return back to your planet...
He even knows my name, too...
Actually, I overheard it while-
Guess I gotta fight God!
A god.
This is probably a God. Not God.
Oh, I gotcha!
Well then, Not God! I'll prove myself to you and then take my girl to a buffet!
